root.name: Saint Seiya: Ougon Densetsu - Kanketsu Hen
root.description: OverviewAs with its predecessor, Saint Seiya: Ougon Densetsu, Ougon Densetsu -Kanketsu Hen is an action game with RPG elements, specifically in the character-on-character boss fights, which are driven entirely by menus and stats. The rest of the game is a scrolling platformer/beat-em-up, as the player takes Saint Seiya (or one of his three friends) as they pursue an astrologically-themed task.
